items.name: Speedmaster 250
items.details: The Speedmaster 250 is a lightweight, efficient road bike with excellent performance.

items.details: The Trailblazer Pro is a full-suspension mountain bike built for off-road adventures.

items.details: The Urban Rider 500 is a comfortable and versatile city bike with a smooth ride.

items.details: The AeroSwift 900 is a high-performance racing bike designed for speed and aerodynamics.

items.details: The E-Mountain 2000 is a powerful electric mountain bike for tackling any terrain.

items.name: Folding Sprinter
items.details: The Folding Sprinter is a compact and portable bike for easy storage and transportation.

items.name: Gravel Grinder X

items.name: Touring Deluxe
items.details: The Touring Deluxe is a long-distance touring bike built for comfort and durability.
